samples.context: In 1987, the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) succeeded in forging an agreement to freeze CFC production at 1986 levels. It is now mandatory for countries to avoid further depletion of the ozone layer through monitoring and controlling the use of ozone-depleting substances.
samples.question: What did UNEP achieve in 1987?
